Header: UN Deputy Secretary General says the international community is behind Sri Lanka
Content: The United Nations have emphasized that at this difficult hour the entire international community was with Sri Lanka. The UN Deputy Secretary General Miguel Angel Moratinos made this reference when he met Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe. The United Nations Deputy Secretary General who has arrived in the island met the Prime Minister. Expressing his condolences with regard to the Easter Sunday attack, he pledged their support to the Government of Sri Lanka. The UN Deputy Secretary General informed that the United Nations Chief informed him to personally meet the Sri Lankan Prime Minister and express their condolences and also express that the entire United Nations system is behind the Prime Minister and the Government of Sri Lanka.
